subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The parade to the foul line was nearly endless in Game 2 on Wednesday as the Clippers sent the Rockets to the free-throw line 64 times, and ended up losing.
snippet: The parade to the foul line was nearly endless in Game 2 on Wednesday as the Clippers sent the Rockets to the free-throw line 64 times, and ended up losing.
